Can someone please explain how I put these items into the game please? My sims game was from here so I can't allow it to get on to the internet for the launcher. Thank you if anyone answers.

Thank you so much, the Steampunk set is the most awesome outfit in Sims 3 :D

sure, download, decompress the files and put them into My Documents/Electronic Arts/Downloads/ directory, disconnect your internet, then load EA Manager, then install the items, reconnect internet when finished

slight typo, the right directory to put the decompressed files in is

My Documents/Electronic Arts/The Sims 3/Downloads/
For Mac, you need another application that can open .7z files,like the application called the unarchiver. Suffit Expander can't open .7z files.
